thread.section_title: Chinese Laundry Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chinese Laundry | www.chineselaundry.com | 6 of 24
thread.title: Mariah

author: Mariah
title: Mariah
text: With past purchases I have always experienced great customer service. I'm in between sizes when I wear their shoes so I have to be careful when buying them online. I just wish that the company would branch out and bring a Chinese Laundry to Chicago. I hate how long I have to wait especially for a shoe that is popular. If they had a store here I could accurately try their mechandise.
